preprocessing 模块

BatchProcessor 类

class habit.core.preprocessing.image_processor_pipeline.BatchProcessor(config_path: str | Path, num_workers: int | None = 1, log_level: str = 'INFO', verbose: bool = True)[源代码]

基类：object

Batch processor for medical image preprocessing.

This class handles parallel processing of medical images using multiple preprocessing steps defined in a configuration file. It supports processing multiple subjects and multiple time points for each subject.

config

Configuration dictionary containing preprocessing steps.

Type:

Dict

num_workers

Number of worker processes for parallel processing.

Type:

int

__init__(config_path: str | Path, num_workers: int | None = 1, log_level: str = 'INFO', verbose: bool = True)[源代码]

Initialize the batch processor.

参数:

  • config_path (Union[str, Path]) – Path to the configuration file.

  • num_workers (Optional[int]) – Number of worker processes. If None, uses number of CPU cores - 1 on Linux/Mac, or 0 on Windows.

  • log_level (str) – Logging level. Defaults to “INFO”.

  • verbose (bool) – Whether to print verbose output. Defaults to True.

save_processed_images(subject_data: Dict) → None[源代码]

Save processed images to their respective output directories.

参数:

subject_data (Dict) – Dictionary containing processed images and their output paths. Expected keys: - ‘output_dirs’: Dict mapping modality names to output directory paths - Other keys should be modality names containing the processed images

process_batch() → None[源代码]

处理所有样本数据。

使用多进程方式进行批处理。
